Windlord:

"Denzabar??? is that your name? what're you doing here? what's your 
faction?"asked Windlord



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> The Caveman watched the robot speak. Specifically his mouth. He 
could 
> understand them but wasn't sure how, he tried to form a sentence 
of his own. 
> "W..w..who? D...Den..Den..Denzab..b..Denzabar." Was all that came 
out.
